author: Crosby Gaige
description: Aromatised, tamed bourbon with complex maraschino notes. Basically, a Whiskey Old Fashioned with maraschino in place of sugar syrup. Surprisingly dry, helped by generous dashes of orange and aromatic bitters.
name: Fancy Free

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
